segments.text: Good afternoon . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to leave this bag with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , sir . Is there anything valuable or breakable in it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well ... there is a necklace in it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you mind taking the necklace with you , or leaving it at the safe deposit box ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , don't bother . I'll take it with me . Will that be all right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , sir . Here is your tag . This cloakroom is open till 11:00 p . m . , could you pick it up by then ?
segments.speaker: S1
